messages.body: $TSLA LOL, this should be interesting
$TSLA Tesla has focused on sedans when Americans clearly want SUVs. https://stocknews.com/news/tsla-tesla-inc-tsla-is-failing-to-address-the-soaring-compact/

links.title: Tesla Inc (TSLA) Is Failing To Address The Soaring Compact SUV Market
links.description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) deserves plenty of credit for becoming a major market player despite not selling or producing very many vehicles. The electric automaker has made EVs cool and desirable for a new generation of car buyers, but its focus on sedans may wind up being its undoing.

messages.body: $TSLA https://cleantechnica.com/2018/02/04/tesla-construct-virtual-solar-power-plant-using-50000-homes-south-australia/

links.title: Tesla To Construct Virtual Solar Power Plant Using 50,000 Homes In South Australia
links.description: Tesla will partner with the government of South Australia to create the world's largest virtual solar power plant involving rooftop solar installations on 50,000 homes within 4 years. The plan is expected to slash utility bills for residents by 30%.

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla dominated EV car sales in January--unlikely to change anytime soon. https://cleantechnica.com/2018/02/04/big-auto-problem-us-electric-car-sales-report/

links.title: Big Auto, We Have A Problem - US Electric Car Sales Report
links.description: Looking at the US sales of top electric cars (including plug-in hybrids), one thing stands out in January: Tesla dominates. This is unlikely to change anytime soon. Though, hopefully Nissan LEAF sales surge with the new version and hopefully Bolt, Volt, and Prius Prime sales rise higher than they did by the end of 2017.
